p: Peroxisome proliferator-activated receptors (PPARα, PPARβ, and PPARγ) regulate metabolic homeostasis and are important mediators of the inflammatory response. Several PPAR agonists have been investigated for efficacy during IAV infections with varying results. Gemfibrozil (PPARα agonist) not only improved symptoms when administered 4 days after infections with an H2N2 virus, but also increased survival of IAV infected mice ( 31). Prophylactic treatment of H1N1-infected mice with pioglitazone (PPARγ agonist) resulted in increased survival ( 32). Combined activation of PPARγ and its downstream target AMPK improved survival of mice infected with pandemic IAV strains ( 33).
